sentences: Pierre Favre (born 2 June 1937) is a Swiss jazz drummer and percussionist born in Le Locle, Switzerland.
He recorded the album Singing Drums (ECM, 1984) with Paul Motian and Nana Vasconcelos.
He also appears on the John Surman album, Such Winters of Memory (1983).
Excursions II Twenty Years After (P&J Music)With Joe McPhee
Alpstein (ECM, 1991)With Furio Di Castri, Paolo Fresu & Jon Balke
